entries.description: A red flower petal that used to be on the head of Red Retro Snake.

entries.name: Necki Swimming Cap
entries.description: A swimming cap fully adorned with flowers that used to be on the head of Blue Retro Snake.

entries.name: Needle
entries.description: A long, sharp needle from Pinboom's body.

entries.name: Needle Pouch
entries.description: A pouch used to keep needles by poking the needle through it.

entries.name: Nependeath Seed
entries.description: A seed cut out of Nependeath. It's poisonous, so it shouldn't be taken lightly.

entries.name: Nependeath's Honey
entries.description: Recovers 1000 for both HP and MP.

entries.name: Neutral Mask
entries.description: A mask made from an expressionless face.

entries.description: An emblem that marks one as a member of the Nightshadows.

entries.name: Ninto Scroll
entries.description: A scroll that contains an enormous amount of valuable information.

entries.name: Nose Ring
entries.description: A nose ring stuck on the nose of cows.

entries.name: Note

entries.name: Octopus Leg

entries.description: An oil canister that holds gasoline.

entries.name: Old Fox's Tail
entries.description: One of the tails from the Old Fox. Very soft and shiny.

entries.description: An old neck bone from Skelosaurus.
